status.description: Status of the user's account. Usually active.  Possible values:  active  inactive

invited.description: Indicates whether an invitation has been sent to the user or not. Usually true.

confirmed.description: Indicates whether the user's account has been confirmed or not.

phone_number.description: Contact phone number of the user.

role.description: Role of the user. Notice that this attribute has no connection with role based access control and permissions. It indicates whether the user is an admin or a regular user.  Possible values:  user  admin

roles.description: An array of roles assigned to the user. Each entry in the array includes a unique identifier of the role and it’s name. You can expect unique values in the array. RBAC API is not yet public.

team_name.description: Name of the team the user belongs to.

group.description: Group the user belongs to. The group entry includes a unique identifier and a name.

reports_to.description: Unique identifier of the manager of the user.

timezone.description: Timezone of the user as the offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) in the format UTC(+|-)[hh]:[mm]. Fallbacks to the account’s timezone if not set per user.

created_at.description: Date and time of creation in UTC (ISO8601 format).

updated_at.description: Date and time of the last update in UTC (ISO8601 format).

deleted_at.description: Date and time of deletion in UTC (ISO8601 format) in case the user has been deleted.

zendesk_user_id.description: If your Sell account is linked to a Zendesk account, the user will have a Zendesk user ID.

identity_type.description: The user can be either a person (an agent) or an integration (an internal system user).  Possible values:  person  integration
